GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
regulator: da9121: Fix uninit-value in da9121_assign_chip_model()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit be96baa0c79588084e0d7a4fa21c574cec9a57f4, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit f3fbd5566f6a8cdb7c48ab29bd1096205b7fbcaf. For more details please see the references link.
